txt.en: The Dunleading war-leader Cledwun has launched an attack against the town of Stoke in the Broadacres.
You have defeated Cledwun's attack force, earning the gratitude of the people of Stoke.
The Dunleading war-leader Cledwun has launched an attack against the town of Stoke in the Broadacres.
<rgb=#FF0000>White Hand forces are assaulting the north-west gate of Stoke</rgb>
<rgb=FF0000>The Dunlending war-leader, Cledwun, has arrived with his guard</rgb>
<rgb=#00FF00>The White Hand forces have been turned aside</rgb>
The Dunleading war-leader Cledwun has launched an attack against the town of Stoke in the Broadacres.
<rgb=#00FF00>Cledwun has been defeated and his forces routed</rgb>
Cledwun's forces are attacking the western side of Stoke.\n\nYou should help defeat the attack on Stoke.
You have defeated Cledwun's attack force, earning the gratitude of the people of Stoke.
You have defeated Cledwun and his attack force
Warband: Cledwun -- The Battle of Stoke
